ai-patthana15.84:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.84:0.3_0: under the inner skin of the flesh, wretched in the eye.
ai-patthana15.84:1.1_0: For the teaching does not give rise to the passion for refuge, and those with the intention and no longer existing condition.
ai-patthana15.84:2.1_0: Not for the sake of himself, he doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.84:3.1_0: When you don’t have a cause of an undetermined principle, without cause or reason, because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.84:3.1_1: When you don’t have a reasoned principle not come to be.
ai-patthana15.84:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
